duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing a variety of customer service and patient care tasks to ensure a positive patient experience.
Ensuring documentation and patient records are prepared and organized.
Greeting and assisting patients, customers and visitors in person and over the phone.
Performing preliminary screening of patients prior to procedures, which may include medical history.
Maintaining a clean and organized work area and ensuring proper supply stock.
Ensuring accurate documentation of patient visits in various electronic systems and on written documents.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent experience required. CPR Certification may be required. Valid state driver's license required.
Preferred: Six months customer service or related experience and/or training. Knowledge of medical terminology is a plus. Bilingual in Spanish is a plus.
